docs.abstract: Government leaders are heralding the recent progress in dissuading offshore tax evasion through secretive havens like Switzerland, Liechtenstein and the Channel Islands. A patchwork of rules and divergent tax rates allows multinational corporations, especially banks, to set up offices [...]

docs.snippet: ALPUY--Julio Uruguay, on April 5, 2009. Age 90. Last original Taller Torres-Garcia artist, came to NY in 1961. Taught generations of students, created a unique and important series of works. Collected by museums internationally. Survived by Joana...
docs.lead_paragraph: ALPUY--Julio Uruguay, on April 5, 2009. Age 90. Last original Taller Torres-Garcia artist, came to NY in 1961. Taught generations of students, created a unique and important series of works. Collected by museums internationally. Survived by Joana Simoes Alpuy, his wife of 43 years. A memorial service will be announced later by his gallery Cecilia de Torres.
